body_html: @suharshs Yes!! The above script is working fine. There are retraining scripts at Googlecodelabs, TensorflowHub, TensorFlow. Also I know of a script in TensorFlow repo at 1.4.0 branch. It'd be convenient if all retraining scripts point to the correct script. Thanks for the help.
body_text: @suharshs Yes!! The above script is working fine. There are retraining scripts at Googlecodelabs, TensorflowHub, TensorFlow. Also I know of a script in TensorFlow repo at 1.4.0 branch. It'd be convenient if all retraining scripts point to the correct script. Thanks for the help.
body: @suharshs Yes!! The above script is working fine. There are retraining scripts at [Googlecodelabs](https://github.com/googlecodelabs/tensorflow-for-poets-2/blob/master/scripts/retrain.py), [TensorflowHub](https://github.com/tensorflow/hub/blob/master/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py), [TensorFlow](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py). Also I know of a [script in TensorFlow repo at 1.4.0 branch](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/v1.4.0/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py). It'd be convenient if all retraining scripts point to the correct script. Thanks for the help.
